title: Massimiliano Allegri - Wikipedia
snippet: He returned to Juventus in 2021, following two years away from management. In his second period at the club, he won another Coppa Italia in 2024, but was sacked only a couple days later, largely due to his behaviour during and after the final, which the club deemed incompatible with its values. He returned as manager of AC Milan in May 2025. Individually, Allegri won the Panchina d'Oro (Golden Bench) four times (2009, 2015, 2017 and 2018) and was four times Serie A Coach of the Year (2011, 2015, 2016 and 2018), as well as being awarded the Enzo Bearzot Award (2015) and inducted into the Italian Football Hall of Fame (2018).
